body_html:
This seems unnecessarily difficult. Is the expectation that everyone creates their own Keras-like wrapper to try to separate sessions and make models easy to copy? Keras is the most reasonable API to Tensorflow I have seen but it seems barely supported.

In any case, Tensorflow has otherwise been great work and I realize that wasn't easy so thank you!

body:
This seems unnecessarily difficult. Is the expectation that everyone creates their own Keras-like wrapper to try to separate sessions and make models easy to copy? Keras is the most reasonable API to Tensorflow I have seen but it seems barely supported.

In any case, Tensorflow has otherwise been great work and I realize that wasn't easy so thank you!
